name: Darkest Companion
description: Darkest Companion is the best app to use during your Darkest Dungeon adventures.  Major features  Recommended provisions for location  Hints about how to succeed for location  Curio / item interactions and outcomes  Boss / enemy strategies  No internet connection required  Comprehensive knowledgebase of the following  Diseases  Quirks  Curio  Locations  Items  Bosses  Enemies  Afflictions & Virtues  Town Events  Glossary  If you have any update suggestions please fill out the in-app suggestion form.
